overview_of_class: Introduction to sociological approaches to economic life. Topics include property rights, illegal markets, money, economic inequalities, direct sales, and boycotts.
name: Economy and Society
title: WCAS SOCIOL 215-0-20 Economy and Society

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Introduction to sociological approaches to economic life. Topics include property rights, illegal markets, money, economic inequalities, direct sales, and boycotts.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
During preregistration this course is only open to Sociology Majors & Minors.
This course is open to all students during regular registration starting November 16, 2015.

subject: SOCIOL
